title: I need a moderator to assist me. High Importance and harrassment
body:
I need a moderator to contact me. I have picture of somebody saying somebody else should go kill themselves and such.

None of the support features have anything for that. no way to report because it was in a custom lobby.

replies.body:
reporting them post-game using the report feature is enough. 

If you were unable to load the post-game lobby or forgot to report them then submitting a ticket would be the alternative: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new

Just fyi, the moderators for these boards only moderate the boards. They are not Rioters themselves so they have no power to ban/punish anyone other than actions shown on the boards.

Now, if you have pictures of such a conversation and wish to show them directly to a Rioter, please submit them in a support ticket. If you are unsure which category to use, you can use

[I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.] > [Game and Features] > [General Questions]

and it will be directed to the correct department.
If moderators don't care about real life threatening then might as well quit the game.

Both Moderators and the Rioters assigned to this board take threats on someone's life very seriously. As *Wolfess* mentioned, the best action to take if this type of thing happens in a custom lobby is to screenshot it and send us a ticket about it. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Someone saying kill yourself on LoL doesn't really count as anything. I say about 90% of the games have someone say that. Sounds like 0 importance, you just want to feel important for getting someone banned. Maybe can't handle this game? A LoL white knight is just idiotic.
